name: Malav Rana
headline: Software Engineer
summary: Frontend Engineer with 4 years of experience in React.js, Angular, Vue.js, and Next.js. Proficient in HTML5, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript with a passion for crafting responsive, accessible applications. Skilled with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Webpack, and modern testing libraries, and comfortable collaborating across Git, AWS, Docker, and Jenkins environments.

skillDescriptions.Front-End Technologies: Modern frameworks, site builders, and UI platforms that keep interfaces responsive and accessible.
skillDescriptions.Programming Languages: Languages I reach for across front-end features, supporting services, and automation.
skillDescriptions.Web Technologies: Build tooling, data integrations, and patterns for performant, interactive experiences.
skillDescriptions.Testing Libraries: Confidence toolkits that keep releases reliable, accessible, and easy to maintain.
skillDescriptions.Environment: Collaboration and delivery environments spanning Git, CodeCommit, AWS, Docker, and Jenkins.

highlights: Utilized HTML5, CSS, and Tailwind CSS to build responsive, accessible, and visually consistent interfaces for live event platforms.
Developed dynamic, interactive features with JavaScript and TypeScript to improve performance, maintainability, and data handling.
Built reusable, component-driven user interfaces with Vue.js and React, reducing duplication and enabling scalable front-end architecture.
Selected the right mix of Vue.js, React, and Tailwind CSS per project requirement to boost team productivity and quality.
Implemented PNPM for faster, cleaner dependency management across projects, streamlining the front-end environment.
Developed dynamic UIs with React.js, leveraging components, hooks, and lifecycle methods for smooth navigation and state management.
Integrated Redux and middleware such as Redux Thunk to handle asynchronous workflows and improve performance.
Utilized Next.js for server-side rendering and static generation to optimize SEO and speed with dynamic routing and API routes.
Created reusable Vue.js components and managed complex state with Vuex to deliver consistent UI/UX across apps.
Implemented unit and integration tests with Jest and React Testing Library to ensure reliable releases.
Applied Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling, enabling rapid development of responsive, visually consistent interfaces.
Leveraged RESTful APIs and GraphQL for efficient data retrieval and interaction.
Configured Webpack for bundling and optimization, and used Git and AWS for version control and deployment.
Built Angular reactive forms to manage user input and validation, and used Angular CLI to speed scaffolding and deploys.
Designed and developed interactive checkout and confirmation screens using React.js with modular, component-based architecture.
Implemented state management with React hooks and Context API to improve interaction during the checkout process.
Optimized performance through lazy loading and code splitting for faster load times and smoother UX.
Integrated RESTful APIs with Axios for accurate, real-time order and prescription data.
Conducted unit and integration tests with Jest and React Testing Library to uphold quality standards.
Leveraged lifecycle methods and custom hooks to manage side effects, asynchronous operations, and reusable logic.
Partnered with UX/UI designers to deliver responsive designs with CSS and Tailwind CSS across devices.
Collaborated with teams on Angular projects to align components and timelines.
Enhanced the donation platform with React.js and Angular + TypeScript to increase engagement and conversions.
Developed responsive interfaces leveraging robust data binding, custom routing, and filters for interactive experiences.
Implemented integrations and features with RESTful APIs, Webpack, and GraphQL to improve data flow and maintainability.
Collaborated with the front-end team using Git, AWS, Docker, and Jenkins for consistent delivery pipelines.
Applied Jest and React Testing Library to ensure reliability and a polished donor experience.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
